name: S2019 Group 15
description:
Tom is a young family dog. Just another ordinary morning, his person took him to the park for a short walk. However, his leash suddenly broke and he got so excitable that he finally could run freely without a leash. Thanks to his person, Tom is not well-trained and not retractable. Although being called, he kept running without looking back. Tom began an unexpected adventure.

This game is a platform running game. While Tom is running, players need to use the keyboards to control the movement of Tom to help him run away from his person as far as possible.
